Inspired by the revival of the arts and crafts movement, the Litze™ Kitchen Collection by Brizo melds artisanal style with clean and contemporary sensibility. A true testament to shape and form, the collection features a strikingly simple bent tube spout on the bridge, pull-down, and bar faucets in three distinct options —Arc, Square and Angled—that can be paired with either the Knurled or Industrial Lever handle. The collection also includes the signature Articulating kitchen faucet, which provides maximum range of motion while making a striking design statement, also available with either handle. Each carefully selected design element—from the range of architectures, to the three spout configurations, to the unique handle options and textured knurling details—ensures this versatile collection feels at home in both modern, minimal environments and urban, industrial spaces.

Making its debut in the kitchen, the stunning Brilliance® Luxe Gold™ finish is available throughout the collection. An additional Matte Black/Brilliance® Luxe Gold™ split finish is also available for added drama in the kitchen. Rounding out the finish options are the Polished Chrome, Brilliance® Stainless and Brilliance® Polished Nickel finishes.
